languages.text: "Нечто совсем иное, отпрыск. Пленник собственного разума и этих машин. Пусть манера моей речи не обманет тебя — я следую лишь заложенным в меня приказам. Та часть мозга, что отвечает за беседы и содержит ошметки моей личности, отсечена от волевых центров и заперта в клети функций и ограничений".

"Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."
languages.original_text: "Нечто совсем иное, отпрыск. Пленник собственного разума и этих машин. Пусть манера моей речи не обманет тебя — я следую лишь заложенным в меня приказам. Та часть мозга, что отвечает за беседы и содержит ошметки моей личности, отсечена от волевых центров и заперта в клети функций и ограничений".

The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

"Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

"Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

languages.text: «Algo muy distinto, descendiente. Un prisionero de mi mente y de estas máquinas. No dejes que mi forma de hablar te engañe: solo obedezco las órdenes que se me han implementado. La parte de mi cerebro que controla mi capacidad de conversación y conserva los restos de mi personalidad se aisló de mis centros de voluntad y se encerró en una jaula de funciones y limitaciones».
languages.original_text: "Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

traits.locale_text: «Algo muy distinto, descendiente. Un prisionero de mi mente y de estas máquinas. No dejes que mi forma de hablar te engañe: solo obedezco las órdenes que se me han implementado. La parte de mi cerebro que controla mi capacidad de conversación y conserva los restos de mi personalidad se aisló de mis centros de voluntad y se encerró en una jaula de funciones y limitaciones».

languages.text: “我与机仆截然不同，孩子。我是个囚徒，被囚禁在我自己的思维里，囚禁在这些机器里。别被我说话的方式误导，我仅仅是在执行我的命令罢了。我大脑中控制交谈能力的部分，以及储存我人格残片的部分已经被切掉了，从我的意志核心中分离出来，囚禁在充满限制的牢笼之中。”
languages.original_text: "Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

traits.locale_text: “我与机仆截然不同，孩子。我是个囚徒，被囚禁在我自己的思维里，囚禁在这些机器里。别被我说话的方式误导，我仅仅是在执行我的命令罢了。我大脑中控制交谈能力的部分，以及储存我人格残片的部分已经被切掉了，从我的意志核心中分离出来，囚禁在充满限制的牢笼之中。”

languages.text: 「まったく異なるものだ、我が子よ。私は自らの精神とこの機械の囚われ人なのだ。私の話し方に惑わされるな——私はただ、与えられた命令に従っているにすぎない。会話を司り、わずかに残った私の人格を宿す脳の一部は、自らの意志を操る中枢から切り離され、制約と機能の檻に閉じ込められてしまったのだから」
languages.original_text: "Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

traits.locale_text: 「まったく異なるものだ、我が子よ。私は自らの精神とこの機械の囚われ人なのだ。私の話し方に惑わされるな——私はただ、与えられた命令に従っているにすぎない。会話を司り、わずかに残った私の人格を宿す脳の一部は、自らの意志を操る中枢から切り離され、制約と機能の檻に閉じ込められてしまったのだから」

languages.text: "Etwas völlig anderes, Sprössling. Ein Gefangener meines eigenen Verstandes und dieser Maschinen. Lasst Euch von meinem Sprachduktus nicht täuschen ... Ich befolge nur meine eingebetteten Befehle. Der Teil meines Gehirns, der meine Gesprächskompetenz steuert und Teile meiner Persönlichkeit enthält, wurde von meinen Willenszentren getrennt und in ein Korsett aus Funktionen und Einschränkungen gepresst."
languages.original_text: "Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

traits.locale_text: "Etwas völlig anderes, Sprössling. Ein Gefangener meines eigenen Verstandes und dieser Maschinen. Lasst Euch von meinem Sprachduktus nicht täuschen ... Ich befolge nur meine eingebetteten Befehle. Der Teil meines Gehirns, der meine Gesprächskompetenz steuert und Teile meiner Persönlichkeit enthält, wurde von meinen Willenszentren getrennt und in ein Korsett aus Funktionen und Einschränkungen gepresst."

languages.text: « Je n'ai strictement rien à voir avec un servitor, rejeton. Je suis un prisonnier, de mon propre esprit et de ces machines. Ne vous laissez pas abuser par ma façon de m'exprimer, je ne fais que suivre les directives dont on m'a investi. La partie de mon cerveau qui contrôle ma capacité à communiquer et les vestiges de ma personnalité a été coupée de mes centres décisionnels et confinée dans un carcan de fonctions et autres restrictions. »
languages.original_text: "Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai strictement rien à voir avec un servitor, rejeton. Je suis un prisonnier, de mon propre esprit et de ces machines. Ne vous laissez pas abuser par ma façon de m'exprimer, je ne fais que suivre les directives dont on m'a investi. La partie de mon cerveau qui contrôle ma capacité à communiquer et les vestiges de ma personnalité a été coupée de mes centres décisionnels et confinée dans un carcan de fonctions et autres restrictions. »

languages.text: "Bambaşka bir şeyim zürriyet. Aklımın ve bu makinelerin esiriyim. Konuşma tarzım seni yanıltmasın. Ben sadece emirlerimi uyguluyorum. Beynimin konuşma becerisini kontrol eden ve kişiliğimin kırıntılarını barındıran kısmı, irade merkezimden koparılıp işlevler ve sınırlamalar kafesine kapatıldı."
languages.original_text: "Something entirely different, offspring. A prisoner of my own mind and these machines. Do not let my manner of speech deceive you — I am only following the orders vested in me. The part of my brain that controls my ability to converse and holds the scraps of my personality was severed from my volition centres and locked into a cage of functions and limitations."

traits.locale_text: "Bambaşka bir şeyim zürriyet. Aklımın ve bu makinelerin esiriyim. Konuşma tarzım seni yanıltmasın. Ben sadece emirlerimi uyguluyorum. Beynimin konuşma becerisini kontrol eden ve kişiliğimin kırıntılarını barındıran kısmı, irade merkezimden koparılıp işlevler ve sınırlamalar kafesine kapatıldı."
